startDeck.name: Ghost
startDeck.text: Reveals its origins when in a specific location.

startDeck.name: Chaos Rune
startDeck.text: Once per turn, choose to draw 1 and play it.

startDeck.name: Misthalin
startDeck.text: teleport all players to the location of misthalin, this location has no special effects.

startDeck.name: Abyss
startDeck.text: When this card is in play, each player has to discard down to 1 card to end their turn.

startDeck.name: Draw 2
startDeck.text: When this card is in play, each player will draw 2 cards per turn.

startDeck.name: Play 2
startDeck.text: When this card is in play, each player will play 2 cards per turn.

startDeck.name: Hand Limit 1
startDeck.text: When this card is in play, each player has to discard down to 1 card to end their turn.

startDeck.name: Keeper Limit 3
startDeck.text: When this card is in play, each player can have 3 keepers in play.

startDeck.name: Teleblock
startDeck.text: When this card is in play, location can not be changed.

startDeck.name: Teleport
startDeck.text: teleport to an available location of your choosing.

startDeck.name: Rules Reset
startDeck.text: When played, all rules will be returned to their base values from the start of the game.

startDeck.name: Pick up all keepers
startDeck.text: When played, all players must pick up all their keepers in play.

startDeck.name: Trade Hands
startDeck.text: When played, choose a player to trade hands with.

startDeck.name: Reset One Rule
startDeck.text: When played, choose 1 rule to reset.

startDeck.name: Reset half of rules(upto)
startDeck.text: When played, choose up to half the rules to reset.

startDeck.name: Draw 3, Play 2
startDeck.text: Draw 3 cards, out of those 3 cards you must choose 2 to play and finally discard the remaining card.

startDeck.name: Draw 2, Use'em
startDeck.text: Draw 2 cards and immediately use them.

startDeck.name: Draw 5, discard 2
startDeck.text: Draw 5 cards, out of those 5 cards you must choose 3 to play and finally discard the remaining cards.

startDeck.name: Everyone draw 1
startDeck.text: All players draw 1 card.

startDeck.name: Steal A Keeper
startDeck.text: Choose a keeper on field to take into your possession.

startDeck.name: Exchange Keepers
startDeck.text: Choose 2 keepers on the field and swap their locations.

startDeck.name: Everyone Discard 1
startDeck.text: Draw 2 cards and immediately use them.

startDeck.name: telestop
startDeck.text: out of turn stop an opposing players teleport, during your turn teleport to misthalin.
